entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as having detention with Umbridge and being unhappy about it. ("How was detention with Umbridge, anyway? What did she make you do?")

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is sympathetic towards Harry's bad day. ("That's not too bad, then, eh?" "Nope")

entities.name: Umbridge
entities.description: The teacher who gave Harry detention, mentioned as being strict and making Harry do lines. ("How was detention with Umbridge, anyway? What did she make you do?")

entities.name: North Tower
entities.description: A location where Harry and Ron go together after their conversation about detention. ("They hurried off to North Tower together.")

relationships.description: Harry had detention with Umbridge, who made him do lines. ("How was detention with Umbridge, anyway? What did she make you do?")
Ron is sympathetic towards Harry's bad day. ("That's not too bad, then, eh?" "Nope")
Harry and Ron went to North Tower together after their conversation about detention. ("They hurried off to North Tower together.")
